job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes core software engineering activities: designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining software, which aligns with the definition of 'Software Development & Integration'.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
job_tasks.justification: Research, design, and prototyping are fundamental activities within software development, especially when exploring new features or functionalities, fitting the 'Software Development & Integration' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of software components and the crucial aspect of ensuring quality through testing (unit and system-level), which are core software engineering practices under 'Software Development & Integration'.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
job_tasks.justification: Paired programming and code review are established software development practices aimed at improving code quality and knowledge sharing, fitting within 'Software Development & Integration'.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the application of established software engineering principles (coding, design, implementation) to create software components, fitting the 'Software Development & Integration' category.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
soft_skills.justification: This involves working closely with another role (Product Owner) to define requirements and tests, which is a collaborative effort.

soft_skills.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
soft_skills.justification: Paired programming and code reviews inherently involve direct communication and collaboration between developers.

soft_skills.phrase: Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly states the importance of communication for setting expectations and creating a positive team environment.

soft_skills.phrase: Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
soft_skills.justification: This describes the active process of sharing knowledge and utilizing the collective expertise of the team, which is a core aspect of collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement exclusively details tasks related to traditional software engineering (designing, developing, testing, maintaining software, code reviews, collaboration on requirements). There are no tasks described that involve the development, fine-tuning, integration, or application of AI/ML models, generative or otherwise. Therefore, the role is classified as a Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the tasks involved. All responsibilities listed fall squarely into traditional software engineering. The absence of any AI/ML-specific tasks, despite the mention of 'AI' in the title, makes the classification straightforward.
